title: ID needed on mystery illustration
content:
A challenge for the ages: I’m picturing an illustration. Black, Orange and Red. It was the opener for (I believe) the Fall 2007 Movie Preview for Entertainment Weekly. Any help in indentifying both the illustrator and the illustration itself would be greatly appreciated.

 [‹ truetype fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080904213517/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37397 "Go to previous forum topic") [Cyrillic Asian italic glyph forms ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080904213517/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37954 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cmyk21
